rules_text: Enemy Without deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“The Father of Machines is lord of stone and steel, sand and skin.”
—[/i]Phyrexian Scriptures[i][/i]
rules_text2: For each land you control, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The land was your first lover, and I shall hold you until she does.”
—“Love Song of Night and Day”[/i]
